description: This PHP source file provides a web-based interface for adding port forwarding rules on a network device. It includes HTML forms, JavaScript validation, and PHP code to handle user input for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses, as well as interaction with connected device data.

methods.name: populateIPv6Addr
methods.description: Parses an IPv6 address string into an array of its components, handling compressed '::' notation.

methods.name: IsBlank
methods.description: Checks if form inputs with a given prefix are empty or only whitespace.

methods.name: GetAddress
methods.description: Concatenates the values of form inputs with a given prefix into an address string separated by a specified separator.

methods.name: isIp6AddrRequired
methods.description: Determines if IPv6 address inputs are required based on form state.

methods.name: ipv6_in_int
methods.description: Converts an IPv6 address (array) into an integer array for comparison.

methods.name: isHex
methods.description: Checks if a given string is a valid hexadecimal number.

methods.name: validate_v6addr_pool
methods.description: Validates whether IPv6 addresses are within a specified range.

methods.name: isIp4AddrRequired
methods.description: Checks if IPv4 address input is required based on form state.
